TRIGGER_INTRO: At the beginning of your end step,
At the beginning of combat on your turn,
CREATURE_TRIGGER: deals combat damage to a player
ACTIVATED_EFFECT: Target creature gains lifelink until end of turn.
Target Vampire gains menace until end of turn.
Draw a card, then discard a card.
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
BLOOD_REMINDER: A Blood token is an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card."

W: lifelink
Whenever this creature enters the battlefield, create a Blood token.
Whenever you sacrifice a Blood token, you gain 1 life.
Whenever one or more Blood tokens enter the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Whenever this creature or another creature you control with lifelink dies, create a Blood token.
Whenever you gain life, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a Blood token.
Whenever you sacrifice an artifact, you may gain 2 life.
At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, create a Blood token.
Whenever this creature blocks, you may sacrifice a Blood token. If you do, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to it this turn.
Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, create a Blood token.
Whenever you discard a card, you may gain 1 life.
Whenever a Blood token you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may exile up to one target creature card from a graveyard.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more Blood tokens, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a Blood token.
Whenever you sacrifice a Blood token, you may put a shield counter on target creature you control.
U: ward {X}
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may create a Blood token.
Whenever you sacrifice a Blood token, you may scry 1.
Whenever you discard one or more cards, surveil 1.
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a Blood token.
Whenever a Blood token enters the battlefield under your control, you may tap target creature an opponent controls.
Whenever one or more artifacts you control are sacrificed, you may draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever you sacrifice a Blood token, target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.
Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, this creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
At the beginning of your end step, if you drew two or more cards this turn, create a Blood token.
Whenever a Blood token you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may return target instant or sorcery card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever an opponent discards a card, create a Blood token.
Whenever this creature becomes tapped, you may sacrifice a Blood token. If you do, untap it.
Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard, create a Blood token.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control four or more artifacts, this creature can’t be blocked this turn.
B: menace
Whenever this creature enters the battlefield, create two Blood tokens.
Whenever this creature attacks, you may sacrifice a Blood token. If you do, this creature gets +2/+0 and lifelink until end of turn.
Whenever you sacrifice a Blood token, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Whenever one or more creatures an opponent controls die, create a Blood token.
Whenever you discard a card, create a Blood token.
At the beginning of your end step, if you lost 2 or more life this turn, create a Blood token.
Whenever another Vampire you control dies, you may sacrifice a Blood token. If you do, return that card to the battlefield tapped at the beginning of the next end step.
Whenever you sacrifice an artifact, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
Whenever this creature or another Vampire you control deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card. For each card discarded this way, create a Blood token.
Whenever a Blood token you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more Blood tokens, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
Whenever you sacrifice a Blood token, you may return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever you discard a card, you may have target creature get -1/-1 until end of turn.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, if that creature had counters on it, create that many Blood tokens.
Whenever this creature attacks, you may discard a card. When you do, create a Blood token and this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever you sacrifice a Blood token, exile up to one target card from a graveyard. If a creature card is exiled this way, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a Blood token. If you do, draw a card and you lose 1 life.
Whenever this creature becomes blocked, you may sacrifice a Blood token. If you do, each blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Whenever an opponent loses life, if that loss wasn’t from combat damage, create a Blood token.
Whenever one or more Blood tokens enter the battlefield under your control, target opponent loses 1 life.
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, if you had two or more Blood tokens enter the battlefield under your control this turn, return that creature to your hand.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control five or more Blood tokens, each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
Whenever you sacrifice a Blood token, this creature gains indestructible until end of turn.
Whenever you discard a card, put a madness counter on this creature. As long as it has three or more madness counters on it, it has "Whenever you discard a card, each opponent loses 1 life."
Whenever a Blood token you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, if it wasn’t sacrificed, you lose 1 life and draw a card.
Whenever a creature you control with power 4 or greater dies, create two Blood tokens.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice any number of Blood tokens. That player loses that much life and you gain that much life.
R: haste
Whenever this creature enters the battlefield or attacks, create a Blood token.
Whenever you sacrifice a Blood token, this creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
Whenever you discard a card, this creature deals 1 damage to any target.
Whenever you sacrifice an artifact, this creature deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever this creature attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card and create a Blood token.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more Blood tokens, target creature you control gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
Whenever one or more Blood tokens enter the battlefield under your control, you may have this creature gain menace until end of turn.
Whenever you cast a spell from exile, create a Blood token.
Whenever a creature you control dies, you may sacrifice a Blood token. If you do, this creature deals 2 damage to any target.
Whenever you sacrifice a Blood token during combat, target attacking creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever an opponent discards a card, this creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent was dealt 4 or more damage this turn, create a Blood token.
Whenever you sacrifice a Blood token, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until the end of your next turn.
Whenever this creature becomes blocked, you may discard a card. If you do, create a Blood token and this creature deals 1 damage to each creature blocking it.
G: Whenever this creature enters the battlefield, create a Blood token.
Whenever you sacrifice a Blood token, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
Whenever you discard a creature card, you may create a Blood token.
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, create a Blood token.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more Blood tokens, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.
Whenever one or more Blood tokens enter the battlefield under your control, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Whenever you sacrifice an artifact, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, create a Blood token.
Whenever you discard a card, you may have target creature you control fight up to one target creature you don’t control.
At the beginning of your end step, if you gained life and a creature you control died this turn, create a Blood token.
Whenever an artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever you sacrifice a Blood token, you may have target creature you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
C: Whenever a Blood token enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control that has a +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever you sacrifice a Blood token, you may add one mana of any color.
Whenever you discard a card, if it’s a creature card, create a Blood token.
At the beginning of your upkeep, create a Blood token, then if you control ten or more Blood tokens, sacrifice this creature and each opponent loses 10 life.
Whenever one or more artifacts leave the battlefield, scry 1.
Whenever a Blood token you control becomes tapped, you may untap target creature.
Whenever you sacrifice a Blood token, you may exile target nonland permanent until this creature leaves the battlefield.
Whenever a Vampire you control deals combat damage to a player, create a Blood token.
Whenever you discard a card, if it’s the second card you’ve discarded this turn, create two Blood tokens instead.
